markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Agile Warrior](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1450)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The agile warrior uses their speed to jump around the battlefield and create openings. Making use of their Tumbling Attack, the agile warrior likes to spring back and forth between targets every round.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 33

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Agile Warrior](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1450)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 23</row>

**Perception** +25

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +28, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +22, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +24, [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +26

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +5

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [sai](/Weapons.aspx?ID=59)_, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [shuriken](/Weapons.aspx?ID=79)_ (5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 35 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +26 

**Will** +21 

</row>

**HP** 180

**Nimble Dodge** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The agile warrior is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker they can see; **Effect** The agile warrior gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_sai_ +27 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Monk](/Traits.aspx?ID=112), [versatile B](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d4+9 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_shuriken_ +27 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 2d4+11 piercing

**Deadly Disarm**   The agile warrior deals 2d6 precision damage to a creature on a successful [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) attempt.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The agile warrior's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Tumbling Attack** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The agile warrior Strides up to their Speed. During this movement, they can move through the space of one creature without triggering reactions. When the agile warrior moves through a creature's space in this way, that creature becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the end of the agile warrior's turn. If the agile warrior ends their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy

</column>
name: Agile Warrior
